snippet.title: Simulacra Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kaigan.simulacra&hl=en

Download from the App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/simulacra/id1252035454

Play it on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/712730/SIMULACRA/

You came across a mobile phone and found out the owner is missing, disappeared without a trace. By going through it, you have to trace her final steps by talking to her friends, looking through her messages, emails, gallery and much more. Question everything you see because nothing is what it seems.

A spiritual successor to the award winning narrative thriller Sara is Missing, Simulacra expands on using the smartphone interface as a game. With more branching dialogues, recurring puzzles and new "apps" to look through, the simulated experience of looking through someone else's phone is back better than ever.

visit www.kaigangames.com or www.playsimulacra.com for more info
